name: Mykee Ocampo
text: This works for trials only. Wait until they have additional dues or fees and they'll have more sucribers. Eventually everything will be slow again. But who knows. So far ita working for you naman e. Hahahaha.

source_obj.text: This works for trials only. Wait until they have additional dues or fees and they'll have more sucribers. Eventually everything will be slow again. But who knows. So far ita working for you naman e. Hahahaha.

replies.text: May subscription fee na now. You have to choose when you sign up for the one month free trial. Netflix is really really good at the delivery service (madaming technical articles about how they optimize the bandwidth usage regardless of the number of subscribers), so any bottleneck will be on our ISPs here
Talaga. Looks like its worth it.

Might depend what you want. May mga shows that I watched before on UK Netflix na wala sa PH Netflix, and UK has a lot less content that US. Maybe they'll get there eventually. In any case, you can always take the one month free trial to see what they offer.
Yup. Looking at it right now.
